Transcript: James: Your opening night, master. Are you nervous?
Caleb: Strange. I'm hours away from getting all my power back.
James: Enjoy this evening. Watch your enemies fall one by one. In all my years, i have never seen such skill, determination, and courage.
Caleb: Thank you, james. Thank you.

James: It's been an honor playing my small part, master caleb. I regret only that i cannot serve you through eternity. But from this night on, fear nothing. Your skills are at their peak, and your resourceful young bride is at your side.
Caleb: You're willing to admit that now.
James: I misjudged. I leave you, happily, well-matched and well-guarded.
Caleb: Alas, thank you, james -- for your service to my family and your friendship to me.
James: Knowing I've done my job well in your eyes is the reward i take with me to the darkness.
James: Good fortune, master. May rivers of blood spill over the centuries for you and your lovely bride till the sun burns cold.
Caleb: Sleep well, james, now and forever. You've earned it, as i have earned tonight. Very soon my guests will know exactly what i have in store for them.
Alison: What are you doing here?
Rafe: Me? I just heard about this new restaurant --
alison: Rafe, don't lie. You said that there was something that was going to happen tonight.
Alison: Yeah. When is it going to happen? Here? Whatever you said it was is going to happen here? Is there some sort of danger?
alison: Tell me, please! Jamal is in there, and i need to find a way in there.
Rafe: There's nothing I can say! All right? Tonight of all nights, things just got to work out on their own. That's the rules.
Alison: Look, you cannot stand back and do nothing.
Rafe: I don't have a choice.
Rafe: Because I'm -- look, I just got to have faith, all right?
Alison: Yeah, ok. You do that. And I'm not an angel, so i need to get in here. Find a way in here -- I'm sorry --
alison: I need to find a way in. My friends are in there. Rafe, stop it! Rafe, put me down right now!
Jack: You got to believe me. There's no time to argue.
Jack: Caleb's back, and he brought us all here to get his revenge.
Valerie: What revenge? What's he talking about?
Gabriela: No, it can't be. If caleb were here, I would feel it.
Kevin: No! That was caleb's manservant. Lucy and i saw him die in transylvania.
Jack: You all saw him disappear.
Kevin: Why didn't i listen to her? Lucy's been saying all along that caleb was behind this!
Ian: If that monster's back, there's no time for blame now!
Eve: Oh, my god, ian. Kevin, where's danny? Where is he right now?
Kevin: He's at the lighthouse. He's fine. Livvie is taking care of him.
Eve: I have to go there.
Kevin: Not now. Not now, jack!
kevin: Eve, calm down! Daniel is fine. He's with livvie --
jack: No, no, he's not fine! Livvie is working with caleb.
Jack: No one's safe, especially the baby.
Ian: What are you talking about?
Jack: Listen to me. Livvie brought caleb back. She's helped cause all of this.
Kevin: No, no -- no, that can't be!
Eve: Ian, what are we going to do?
Jack: I know you guys don't want to believe this. Neither did I. But they're a team, and they've been working together all along.
Kevin: Lucy would've known that. She would've sensed if livvie were helping caleb.
Jack: She did know. She tried to stop this.
Kevin: Jack, where's lucy right now? Jack?
Jack: Livvie murdered her in cold blood. And we're all next.
Livvie: Time to go, danny. Guess where I'm taking you. You're going to see your daddy. That's right. Time to go see daddy.
Livvie: Time to see your new daddy.
chris: Who cares what livvie did? Lucy's dead -- tragic. Can we please focus? I want to get out of here!
frank: Work out a little frustration first!
Jack: Frank is right! Let's get out of here, and then we --
Frank: We stay calm and work together.
Ian: Let's get this wall moving.
Jamal: Yeah, let's get this moved.
Frank: There's nothing to grab on to.
Chris: There's got to be some kind of weak spot.
Eve: He's really going to do it, ian. He's going to take our son, and he's going to kill us all.
Ian: No, he won't. We're getting out of here, and we're getting our son back.
Frank: I don't know about anyone else, but i'm not going to give him the satisfaction.
Jack: Yeah, caleb thinks we're going to go down without a fight.
Jamal: Right. To hell with that.
Valerie: I don't even know what a caleb is.
Chris: Would you give it a rest? He's not even after you.
Frank: Well, then, who's he after, ramsey?
Kevin: Wait a minute. You knew. That's why you were in such a hurry to get out.
Karen: So i didn't imagine it. Caleb was at your apartment.
Frank: I ought to ring your scrawny, little neck, ramsey!
jamal: What's that? What was that?
Jack: We got to stop it!
alison: I said put me down!
Alison: I'm serious! Right this second! God!
Rafe: Come on, just -- you have to listen to me for a second, please.
Alison: Ok! All right! Fine, ok, but I got to get back. So hurry up with whatever you got to say.
Rafe: I know, I know. You're worried about jamal. You're worried about everyone in there. But I couldn't let you go in that restaurant.
Rafe: Because I didn't want you to see it. I didn't want you to have any part of --
alison: What? What are you talking about? Please, just tell me. Look, I'm not afraid of, like, whatever is going to happen to me, you know?
Rafe: Jamal wouldn't have wanted you in there, either. Trust me, alison. He has all the help he needs. If everyone in there bands together, they -- they can fight this evil and they can win.
Alison: What evil? What are you talking about? And, sorry, but what good is an angel if you won't even lift a heavenly finger?
Rafe: I ask myself the same question.
Alison: Yeah? What sort of answer do you give your angelic self?
Rafe: That i would give anything just to be normal, to not have to face this kind of thing day after day every day. But I'm not just a man, and I can't interfere.
Rafe: Believe me, it's not because I don't want to. See, that -- that's half my problem. I'd risk anything, but i just --
Rafe: It's their lives. It's their choices. And I can't change their destinies.
Alison: Um -- ok. So you're just going to, like, stand there and do nothing?

Rafe: I have done all I can for these people. I've shown everyone in there direction. I've -- I've pointed them where to look deep in their souls for the answers they're looking for. All that's left to do now is to have faith, and i do. I -- I have faith in your friends.
Alison: No, wait. They're -- they're our friends.
Rafe: Ok, ok, our friends! Fine! Our friends. See, even at odds with each other, i believe that they're going to come together. And I'm just not permitted to alter the course of their lives.

Alison: Oh. Oh, no? So, then, what am I doing here? I wanted to be with them, with jamal and everybody else, ok? That -- that's what i chose. But you stopped me and you interfered. Ok, why did you take me away from that restaurant, rafe? Why? Why me?
Kevin: A piece! Anything sharp enough to jam underneath!
Frank: Stick it underneath! Stick it under!
Ian: Chris, frank, give me a hand here!
Kevin: We got it! Let's go!
Chris: This is great! Bar tables against the forces of evil! I love it!
Jack: Wait, wait, wait, wait! Wait! Do you hear that?
Gabriela: It's stopping! We did it!
Alison: You know, rafe, you keep on telling me about all of these stupid rules you can't break and how we all make our own decisions and you can't interfere.
Alison: See, i chose to be with them, ok, and you just picked me up and you carried me out of there.
Rafe: I blew it. I was wrong to do what i did the way I did it.
Alison: Ok, so why did you?
Rafe: I don't know. I -- i lost it. Ok? I guess I overreacted. I mean, I saw you going into that restaurant, and I just -- all I could think about was keeping you safe. I --
alison: You just wanted to protect me.
Alison: Oh. Come here. You're a good friend. You are, ok? And it means -- means a lot. But we both know that I don't really belong here. You know what? I have to go back with jamal and all of them.
rafe: But I -- i can't let you go alone because i'd never forgive myself if anything happened, and I --
alison: Ok, all right. Then just come with me. Ok, you want to come with me, then?
Rafe: Whether you like it or not.
Alison: Yeah. Yeah, I like. Come on. Hey, hey -- come on. If you're going to come with me, there's no time to waste. We got to go, ok? Come on.
Rafe: Right, i'm -- I'm right -- right behind you.
Caleb: Evening, boys and girls. Ok. By show of hands, who missed me?

caleb: Nice to see you, too, doctor. And you, doctor. Doctor. All you semi-doctors, friends of doctors, lovers of doctors, and -- well, just all the little people. I want to thank you all for coming. I know how pressed you all were for time. But perhaps we could just take one moment to truly appreciate the irony of actual walls closing in on you, just like they've been doing for the last months without any of you knowing. And also for my flashy entrance. Feel free to applaud.
Kevin: While we still can, you mean.
Caleb: Relax and take comfort in knowing you won't die alone. And, really, that's what this has all been about -- people coming together and no one missing the really big show.
Caleb: Oh, but then i'd miss the look on your faces when i tell you how i used your own pathetic human love against you.
Jack: The only one who's pathetic here is you, caleb!
Caleb: It was so easy tearing you all apart -- of course, with help from my wife.
Caleb: Olivia was my partner in -- in so many ways. Like bringing valerie to town to separate you from the toothy blonde.

Caleb: Hmm, thank you. And, of course, delivering the letter to you that whipped up all your suspicions about guess who. But I guess I'll never really, really forget her award-winning performance as -- you're looking at me like you don't know what i'm talking about. Well -- well, then, why don't we go to a clip? You know what they say about pictures.
Caleb: Now for the big bonus points --
kevin: Was livvie. That's why lucy was the only one who saw her.

Caleb: Wasn't she brilliant? But nothing really compares to her greatest performance of all. A truly drop-dead -- in fact, that's exactly what your fiancee did when she saw it. Or is it your fiancee? You people have me so confused.
Caleb: I want you to know, dad, your daughter's a very resourceful young woman.
Kevin: No, you -- you brainwashed her. Livvie would never harm anyone on her own.
Kevin: All right, then, where is she? I don't see her here at your sick little circus! She wouldn't come, would she? She refused to have anything to do with it!
caleb: Wrong again! You want her? You got her. So let's give a really nice, warm, port charles welcome for --
eve: Danny! Oh, my gian, he's got danny.
Kevin: Livvie, what are you doing?
livvie: I'm where I belong, dad.
Eve: It's ok. Mommy's here, mommy's here.
Jack: How could you do this?
Livvie: But he's not your son anymore.
Rafe: Alison, wait! Just wait a second, all right?
Alison: What? We've waited long enough, rafe. Our friends are in there! Jamal!
Rafe: They're in there with a dark and powerful force. You got to be careful.
Alison: Fine. I will be careful. Jamal!
Rafe: Listen, listen. Now, i will do what I can, but I just --

alison: Ok, I know. Rafe, listen to me. I know your wings -- they're tied, ok? Look, I appreciate what you're doing. I really, really do. But whatever is going on in there, i'm ready. Ok, I can take it. I promise you. Now, please, just help me find a way in before it's too late. Jamal! Please! Jamal!
Rafe: It's already started. There's nothing we can do.
Eve: No! No! Please, you can't do this!
Ian: Give us back our son!
caleb: I know this sounds kind of silly, but i think he's got my eyes.
Kevin: Livvie -- livvie, you can't do this.
Livvie: Wrong! For the first time, I am making all my own decisions. This is my choice.
Kevin: Only because he wants you to believe that, just like before.
Livvie: No, not this time, dad. I pledged my life to him willingly.
Livvie: It's the way it's supposed to be. Now we're a real family.

Caleb: Not only is it happening, it's about to get better. You see, right before your eyes, as our grand finale, you're about to see proof of eternal devotion, proof that olivia has given herself to me, heart and soul, proof by the look in her eyes of eternal bliss as i make love to my beautiful wife.
Kevin:Vvie -- livvie, listen to me. Livvie!
Caleb: Everything i've ever wanted. The dream that i have been dreaming for centuries.
Jack: Livvie, no, don't do this!
Caleb: Here it is. I have my family. And seeing us bursting with happiness, flush with the joy of victory, is the last thing you'll ever see before you die -- all of you.
Jack: Livvie -- livvie, don't do this.
Livvie: I just -- I want it to be perfect.
Caleb: It is perfect. You look so beautiful.
Livvie: Lose yourself in me. Let me lose myself.
Caleb: Finally mine, forever, through lifetimes of darkness.
Caleb: Entwined in a whirlwind of lust.
Livvie: More. Open your heart. Tell me. Please whisper.
Livvie: Caleb's gone. It's for good this time. We're free. We're free.
Alison: Yeah, it's almost like some sort of miracle.
